title: 820-2850 liquid damaged.  F4260 getting very hot
message: Hey got in a liquid damaged 820-2850 went through replaced everything that looked damaged.  Quite a bit was bad.  now i have video but F4260 is getting super hot and even started melting the chip a little. What would be causing this?  Also i have no power on both usb's.  I can fix the usb issue but wanted to fix the f4260 first.

title: 820-2850 liquid damaged.  F4260 getting very hot
message: Rip it off including Q4260, firewire is never used.
